title: S1 Ep67: The search for good jobs
itunes:title: The search for good jobs
description: There are 420 million young people in Africa today, but 140 million are unemployed, and another 130 million are underemployed or in working poverty. What type of interventions will help them in their search for a good job? Anna Vitali and Imran Rasul tell Tim Phillips about a multi-year experiment in Uganda that reaches some surprising conclusions.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
